diff_act: 3.select specific data fields and criteria for report generation
5.include necessary documentations and graphical representations into reports
6.enable the integration and display of PDF file content within generated reports
7.provide options for saving and exporting reports in different formats such as PDF, Excel, and Word

regen.new_specification: The system shall provide the capability to incorporate PDF files into generated reports.

regen.absent_element: situation of incorporating PDF files into reports
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide the ability to incorporate PDF files into reports, thereby enabling their integration and display within generated reports.

regen.absent_element: full integration and display of PDF file within the report
regen.new_specification: The system shall enable the full integration and display of PDF file content within the generated reports.

label: The system shall provide the ability to incorporate PDF files into standard Pontis reports.
absence: action of incorporating PDF files into standard reports
